string-array.item: Pikachu, the Mouse Pokémon. It can generate electric attacks from the electric pouches located in both of its cheeks.
So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
A flame burns on the tip of its tail from birth. It is said that a Charmander dies if its flame ever goes out.
Bulbasaur, the Seed Pokémon. A young Bulbasaur uses the nutrients from its seed for the energy it needs to grow.
Squirtle, the Tiny Turtle Pokémon. During battle, Squirtle hides in its shell that sprays water at its opponent whenever it can.
Meowth, the Scratch Cat Pokémon. When it sees round objects, it plays and loses track of time.
